[Home](./index.md) &gt; [state-model](./state-model.md)

## state-model package

A library for managing relational state in the application and in communications with an external api.

## Remarks

The library treats communications with the external api optimistically, therefore ids are generated as a random string on the client. The library does not support many-to-many relationships.

|  [SaveModelHttpEffect](./state-model.savemodelhttpeffect.md) |  |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [\_deleteModelWithChildren(state, stateProp, cfg)](./state-model._deletemodelwithchildren.md) | Responsible for deleting model with given id(s) and children with cascadeDelete set to true. |
|  [\_getModelDisplayValue(prop, value)](./state-model._getmodeldisplayvalue.md) | Get display value for model |
|  [\_getRangeWithRelations(state, cfg, filter)](./state-model._getrangewithrelations.md) | Get all or given range of models with specified relationships set on model according to model property config set in [ModelStateConfig](./state-model.modelstateconfig.md) |
|  [\_getRelationProps(cfg)](./state-model._getrelationprops.md) | Get state properties of relationships specified in input config. |
|  [\_getWithRelations(state, cfg, id)](./state-model._getwithrelations.md) | Get model with specified relationships set on model according to model property config set in [ModelStateConfig](./state-model.modelstateconfig.md) |
|  [\_modifyModelWithForeigns(state, stateProp, entity, entityFn)](./state-model._modifymodelwithforeigns.md) | Add or update a model and any foreign relationships set on the provided model value according to [ModelStateConfig](./state-model.modelstateconfig.md) |
